daily_trend.name: daily_trend
daily_trend.template: SELECT {{ date_column }}, SUM({{ cost_column }}) as daily_cost FROM {{ table_name }} {% if filters %}WHERE {{ filters }}{% endif %} GROUP BY {{ date_column }} ORDER BY {{ date_column }}
daily_trend.example: SELECT date, SUM(cost) as daily_cost FROM cost_analysis WHERE date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) GROUP BY date ORDER BY date

monthly_comparison.name: monthly_comparison
monthly_comparison.template: SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM {{ date_column }}) as year, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM {{ date_column }}) as month, SUM({{ cost_column }}) as monthly_cost FROM {{ table_name }} {% if filters %}WHERE {{ filters }}{% endif %} GROUP BY year, month ORDER BY year, month
monthly_comparison.example: SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) as year, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM date) as month, SUM(cost) as monthly_cost FROM cost_analysis GROUP BY year, month ORDER BY year, month

rolling_average.name: rolling_average
rolling_average.template: SELECT {{ date_column }}, SUM({{ cost_column }}) as daily_cost, AVG(SUM({{ cost_column }})) OVER (ORDER BY {{ date_column }} ROWS BETWEEN {{ window_size }} PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as rolling_avg FROM {{ table_name }} {% if filters %}WHERE {{ filters }}{% endif %} GROUP BY {{ date_column }} ORDER BY {{ date_column }}
rolling_average.example: SELECT date, SUM(cost) as daily_cost, AVG(SUM(cost)) OVER (ORDER BY date ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as rolling_7day_avg FROM cost_analysis GROUP BY date ORDER BY date
